sense.def:
To flatten something
ali
to flatten something out
pomeni nekaj narediti ploščato ali bolj plosko.

seg.quote: The steel rod had been slightly flattened.
The lump had flattened out, almost.

sense.def:
To flatten oneself against something
pomeni pritisniti se tesno k nečemu.

seg.quote: She flattened herself against the door to avoid detection.

sense.def:
To flatten buildings or crops
pomeni uničiti stavbe ali posevek tako, da jih podremo ali zravnamo z zemljo.

seg.quote: Huge areas of Queen Victoria Street were flattened by bombs.
